snippet.title: JUMANJI: The Curse Returns OUT NOW on Steam!
snippet.description:
JUMANJI: The Curse Returns is a new board game and fun, casual co-op adventure for you and your friends, and it’s available NOW on Steam!

Roll the dice, read the riddles and experience the board game from the original 1995 film in a contemporary digital style. The JUMANJI board game will summon a magical jungle and take over the town — unless you stop it! 

Face the dangers with your friends and prepare for a fun co-op adventure like no other. In every round you’ll be rolling the dice, reading the riddle, and matching the correct items from your stash with those needed to send the peril back into the board. Time restrictions mean you’ll be working as a team throughout, but it’s easy-to-master fun you can enjoy together with friends and family. 

You’ll face crocodiles, elephants, rhinos and more, plus creeping jungle vines that will try to ensnare you all. And if JUMANJI releases Van Pelt, the hunter will pop up at random moments and try to disable your team! It’s up to you and your friends to stop JUMANJI from invading the town! Stand together, make it to the center of the board… and win the game.

Buy NOW and get 10% off Launch Discount!

Follow Marmalade Game Studio:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MarmaladeGameStudio/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarmaladeGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marmaladegames/
